titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Archives of Irish America Photograph Collection AIA.053
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Bonnie Gordon

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2015-08-06T15:23-0400

did.unittitle: Archives of Irish America Photograph Collection

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

did.abstract: This is an artifical collection created by the Archives of Irish America during its early years of collecting. The collection consists of a variety of photographs, many of which document sporting events, musical performances, and social functions organized by various Irish American social or fraternal organizations in the greater New York City area.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The Archives of Irish America, a special collection documenting the the Irish migration experience and American Irish ethnicity in the 20th century, accumulated these photographs via active collection by staff, contributions from donors and from material removed from collections in the Archives.

custodhist.head: Custodial History note
custodhist.p: The Archives of Irish America Photograph Collection is an artificial collection created via active collection by staff, contributions from donors and from material removed from collections in the Archives. There is no documentation or accession information about the origin of the materials in this collection.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This is an artifical collection created by the Archives of Irish America during its early years of collecting. The collection consists of a variety of photographs, many of which document sporting events, musical performances, and social functions organized by various Irish American social or fraternal organizations in the greater New York City area.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The Tamiment Library does not have information about who owns copyright to this collection. Materials in this collection are expected to enter the public domain in 2128. The Tamiment Library is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from this collection.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Archival Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Archives of Irish America County Societies Collection (AIA 003)
Archives of Irish America Manuscript Collection (AIA 006)

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Archives of Irish America Photograph Collection; AIA 053; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements note
phystech.p: Rolled panoramas have been removed from the open collection pending conservation treatment and are unavailable to researchers.
